name: Memorial
description: A memorial for the wildlife that have been killed or had to flee due to wildfires. This memorial is designed to be a den or protective nest for animals and will decay and decompose as the burnt land replenishes and grows. All that will remain, once the land is healthy again, is a stone plaque with the date of the fire. The color of the inside of the memorial is a red-orange color that attracts birds. And birds are the first hope for bringing life back to this area. They fly and drop seeds and other materials which will inevitably bring new life over time.

name: Green Guardian
description: A web application for plant lovers to post concerns about their houseplants and give and recieve advice on their plants

name: Tech Blog
description: A CMS-style blog that allows users to publish posts and interact with other users

name: Smart Pack
description: A web application that uses 3rd party APIs to create packing lists for users based on their upcoming travel plans

name: Note Taker App
description: An application to write and save notes which are stored on a web server and can be accessed from any device at any time
